readyPrompt: й_Draw or select line to generate an elevation profile____________________________й.
readyPromptCreateOnly: й_Draw line to generate an elevation profile_______________________й.
readyPromptSelectOnly: й_Select line to generate an elevation profile________________________й.
creatingPrompt-2d: й_Create elevation profile by clicking in the map to place your first point, use double-click for last point_______________________________________________________й.
creatingPrompt-3d: й_Create elevation profile by clicking in the scene to place your first point, use double-click for last point________________________________________________________й.
selectingPrompt-2d: й_Create elevation profile by clicking in the map to select a line__________________________________й.
selectingPrompt-3d: й_Create elevation profile by clicking in the scene to select a line___________________________________й.
uniformChartScalingEnable: й_Use uniform scaling for the chart. X and Y axes will have the same scale______________________________________й.
uniformChartScalingDisable: й_Use non-uniform scaling for the chart. Y axis will be scaled to fit elevation values____________________________________________й.

errors.unknown: й_There was an unknown error generating the profile__________________________й.

errors.invalidGeometry: й_Profile could not be generated. Invalid geometry__________________________й.
errors.invalidElevationInfo: й_Profile could not be generated. Elevation options of the line are not supported_________________________________________й.
